channel.title: Portfolio website for Shengwei Lai
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio website for Shengwei Lai

item.title: Arrivals at tourist accommodation establishments
item.description: get data download data from Eurostat tour_occ_arm <- get_eurostat(id="tour_occ_arm") glimpse(tour_occ_arm) ## Rows: 216,654 ## Columns: 6 ## $ c_resid <chr> "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FO... ## $ unit <chr> "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR",... ## $ nace_r2 <chr> "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I5... ## $ geo <chr> "BG", "CH", "ES", "FI", "HR", "HU", "IS", "LI", "LV", "NL",... ## $ time <date> 2020-07-01, 2020-07-01, 2020-07-01, 2020-07-01, 2020-07-01.

item.title: Euro yield curve
item.description: get data download data from Eurostat yield_curve <- get_eurostat(id="irt_euryld_m") yield_curve$maturity <- factor(yield_curve$maturity, ordered = TRUE, levels = c("Y1","Y2","Y3","Y4","Y5","Y6","Y7","Y8","Y9","Y10", "Y11","Y12","Y13","Y14","Y15","Y16","Y17","Y18","Y19", "Y20","Y21","Y22","Y23","Y24","Y25","Y26","Y27","Y28", "Y29","Y30")) #order maturity glimpse(yield_curve) ## Rows: 34,740 ## Columns: 6 ## $ yld_curv <chr> "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "IN... ## $ bonds <chr> "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA"... ## $ maturity <ord> Y1, Y10, Y11, Y12, Y13, Y14, Y15, Y16, Y17, Y18, Y19, Y2, ... ## $ geo <chr> "EA", "EA", "EA", "EA", "EA", "EA", "EA", "EA", "EA", "EA".

item.title: Gas price
item.description: get data download data from Eurostat gas_price <- get_eurostat(id="nrg_pc_202") glimpse(gas_price) ## Rows: 42,250 ## Columns: 8 ## $ product <chr> "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4... ## $ consom <chr> "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "41... ## $ unit <chr> "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV"... ## $ tax <chr> "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_T... ## $ currency <chr> "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "EUR", "E.

item.title: selected stocks in China A-share market
item.description: get data get stock prices of 7 China A-share companies and Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE) Composite Index using tidyquant package myStocks <- c("600519.SS", "000651.SZ", "601318.SS", "600276.SS", "600585.SS", "000002.SZ","600009.SS", "601398.SS", "002594.SZ", "000001.SS") %>% tq_get(get = "stock.prices", from = "2015-01-01", to = "2020-09-30") %>% group_by(symbol) name <- data.frame(name = c("Moutai", "Gree", "PingAn", "Hengrui", "Conch Cement", "Vanke","Shanghai Airport", "ICBC", "BYD", "SSE_Index"), symbol = c("600519.SS", "000651.SZ", "601318.SS", "600276.SS", "600585.SS","000002.SZ", "600009.SS", "601398.SS", "002594.SZ", "000001.

item.title: Ipsum
item.description: Nullam et orci eu lorem consequat tincidunt vivamus et sagittis magna sed nunc rhoncus condimentum sem. In efficitur ligula tate urna. Maecenas massa sed magna lacinia magna pellentesque lorem ipsum dolor. Nullam et orci eu lorem consequat tincidunt. Vivamus et sagittis tempus.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
